title: Register New Face
description: Complete the form below to register a new face in the system. Please upload a clear image with a single face.

form.name: Your Name:
form.photoDesc: Please select a clear photo of your face. Only one face should be visible in the image.

error.name: Please enter your name
error.photoRequired: Please capture or upload a photo
error.general: Failed to register face. Please try a different image.

newspaper.intro: The Face Registration process allows users to securely register their face biometrics for fast and contactless identification. This technology uses advanced neural networks to create a unique facial signature.
newspaper.benefits: Benefits of face registration include enhanced security, faster identification, and a convenient authentication method without the need for passwords or ID cards.
newspaper.privacy: Your privacy is our priority. All facial data is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with global data protection regulations.
